__e: The important thing for the stability of our rule... is to maintain the balance between good and evil... and I don't think any of you are ready for that responsibility.
When you opened the door, you upset the balance between life and death... and you awoke her.
Trying to capture his brother in a flask... and preserve the balance of good and evil on Earth.
No offence, I was feeling the balance.
That's all I want to do here... help put your life back in balance.
And I asked him to take it down, but he said that it would ruin the balance of the collage.
It took me a while to get my balance again and I don't want to lose that, I don't want to give it up.
Show them how to keep their balance and take it away from the other guy. Not so low.
